endpoints.description: Fetch the historical electricity demand data for analysis.
Submit parameters for predicting future electricity demand.
Retrieve the current real-time data related to energy consumption and demand.
Upload data collected from smart meters for processing.
Obtain the current status of grid stability and balance.
Set up configurations to receive alerts related to demand and supply issues.
Download monthly reports on electricity consumption and grid performance.
Adjust sensor calibration settings for accurate measurements.
Analyze and display the impact of weather conditions on electricity demand.
Submit data regarding the integration of renewable energy sources into the grid.
